remarks: Membership in a ball, alternative definition.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
statement: elbl4 $p |- ( ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ R e. RR+ ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( B e. ( A ( ball ` D ) R ) <-> B ( `' D " ( 0 [,) R ) ) A ) ) $.
